title: PVP.net Patcher not working
body: I tried doing different things and it won't stop working, I haven't tried "re patching" because I don't know how to. Help.

replies.body:
Issues during patching can be caused by a few different things. Check out our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) for a list of steps that commonly resolve these types of issues.

Let me know how if that guide helped with your issue.
the same thing is going on with me i dont know either
